title: Welcome to the Latest Edition of
The Justia Insider
message: Welcome to another edition of the Justia Insider! We hope you all had a blast of fun with Halloween. November is here, which only means that the time for holidays with friends and family has come. Letâ€™s celebrate the peak of fall and start thinking about holiday preparations for Thanksgiving, the Day of the Dead, and beyond! Start planning with teams and colleagues if you are taking PTO.
